Subject: Neo Beast Wars
Message-ID: <8k51uc+pf2m@...>
In-Reply-To: <20000707162337.20292.qmail@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0

X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: logomorph@...

::KitKat::

She went out along the perimeter.  She ran along as fast as she 
could.  She loved to run and feel the wind in her face.  She came 
across a bear.  It was a big Grizzly.  She felt like a fight, and 
this bear was in a foul mood anyway.  She put hr ears back and 
growled loudly at it.  The bear stood up on it's hind legs and 
growled back. She bared her teeth and growled louder.  The bear went 
down on all fours and took a swipe at her with his claws.  She jumped 
sideways and dodged.  She lept and jumped on the bear's back.  She 
bit into it's shoulder and hung on for the ride.  The bear tossed and 
tried to reach her, but she was on about the center of it's back.  
the bear lunged and threw itself around trying to dislodge her.  She 
let go and landed on her feet.  She turned and faced the bear.  The 
bear swiped at her again.  The bear tore through part of her left 
hindquarter.  She yelped and ran a few feet to regain her ground.n  
The bear attacked again, trying to bite down on her.  She moved and 
dodged.  The bear came down with it's claws and swiped at her again.  
She dodged and lept again, only ths time, she jumped at the front of 
the bear and dug her teeth into the bears neck.  She could feel the 
blood gush out and run down her face and neck.  The bear came 
craching down on the ground and almost flattened her, but she kept 
her grip on the bear's neck.  The bear took a few more swipes at 
her.  She  had two more gashes in her.  One on her back, and one on 
her right side. But she held on.  She let go of the bear's neck and 
ran back a few feet, regaining her stance, she bared her teeth and 
flattened her ears against her head.  This bear was a good fight.  It 
was bleeding heavily at the throat now.  She wasn't in the greatest 
of shape either. The bear had torn a chunk out of her left 
hindquarter, left a claw trail on her back and right side.  She was 
leaking mech fluid, but she didn't feel the pain.  That would have to 
wait untill after the fight.  The bear came round again with it's 
claws ready to gut her.  She jumped up and bit the bear on the face, 
tearing out an eye.  The bear yelled in pain as it stepped back.  The 
bear turned and ran into the forest.
"COWARD!" she yelled as the bear ran off.
She looked herself over for a minute.  She needed to get repairs 
done, but she was happy.  she got that fighting mood out of her 
system.  She loped back to the base.  she saw Quickstrike sitting 
there.  She walked passed him with her head held high.  "High there 
boss-bot."
